member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Linetime.Cryptography.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:Linetime.Cryptography.SimpleEncryption.Encode(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Encodes a text string as garbled string of characters
member.param: If true the resultant string will never contain apostrophies. Must also set this param when using Decode on the same string.
